statements: UPDATE network_traffic_policies SET policy_name='Internal Policy', traffic_type='Intranet', priority_level=1, policy_details='Allow access to company resources' WHERE id=1
UPDATE network_traffic_policies SET priority_level=2, traffic_type='Internet', policy_details='Block social media access', policy_name='External Policy' WHERE id=2
UPDATE network_traffic_policies SET policy_name = 'Updated Policy 1', priority_level = 5, policy_details = 'New details for Policy 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE network_traffic_policies SET traffic_type = 'Inbound', priority_level = 3, policy_details = 'Revised details for Inbound Traffic' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE network_traffic_policies SET max_bandwidth=1000, policy_enabled=true, priority_level=2 WHERE policy_id=1;
UPDATE network_devices SET device_ip_address='192.168.1.10', device_type='router', device_name='Office Router' WHERE device_id=2;

UPDATE subscribers SET subscription_type = 'Premium' WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
UPDATE network_policies SET policy_name='New Priority Policy', priority=5 WHERE policy_id=1;

UPDATE traffic_classes SET priority = 1 WHERE class_id = 3;
UPDATE network_devices SET location = 'Data Center' WHERE device_name = 'Switch';
UPDATE traffic_classes SET priority = 2 WHERE class_id = 1
UPDATE policy_rules SET action = 'Allow' WHERE rule_id = 5
UPDATE network_policies SET description = 'Updated policy description' WHERE policy_id = 1;
